title: The EU Open Source Policy Summit 2026: Key learnings and takeaways
content: The EU Open Source Policy Summit 2026, held on 30 January in Brussels under the theme ‘Digital Sovereignty Runs on Open Source’, brought together European policymakers, industry leaders, and open source advocates to address how open technologies can deliver on Europe’s competitiveness and sovereignty ambitions as part of the EU Open Source Week. This year’s Summit also announced a key transition: the appointment of Laszlo Igneczi as OpenForum Europe‘s new Executive
creator: Nicholas Gates
sourceDescription: Open Technologies for Europe's Digital Decade
